title: Manitto
description: Joonyoung helped Jiyoon when she was lost on campus, and ever since that day, he had hoped to see her again. Their paths crossed once more during leaders training, where they unexpectedly reunited... While playing the manitto finding game, and through her batch mates, Jiyoon slowly begins to change! "The first meeting, the first person to show me kindness, and my Manitto..."
author: MalChocoChip
